name: Portfolio
description: My portfolio website with a cool interactive 3D model
author: MrMysteryCoder

scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:docs
scripts.deploy:docs: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');function copyDir(src,dest){if(!fs.existsSync(dest))fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});const entries=fs.readdirSync(src,{withFileTypes:true});for(const entry of entries){const srcPath=path.join(src,entry.name);const destPath=path.join(dest,entry.name);if(entry.isDirectory()){copyDir(srcPath,destPath);}else{fs.copyFileSync(srcPath,destPath);}}}if(fs.existsSync('docs'))fs.rmSync('docs',{recursive:true,force:true});copyDir('dist','docs');" && git add docs && git commit -m "Deploy to docs folder" && git push origin main
